entry.title: G1 LithiumTech Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G1 Battery
Price: 50.00

Important: This battery is only usable with the G1 model, not the current G2PRO by TheraGun.

About G1 LithiumTech Battery

LithiumTech batteries feature electronic single-cell protection that shields each cell from overcharging. LithiumTech batteries can also be charged for up to three times more cycles than a standard Ni-Cd battery. They work without memory effect, produce minimal self-discharge and weigh up to 60 percent less for all day use. Battery charge will last approximately 20 minutes, depending on usage and pressure. It takes 15 minutes to reach a 75% charge and 30 minutes to fully charge. For a longer life, the battery should be removed from the power source when fully charged.


Features/Specifications:

  • Item weight: 6.4 oz
  • Product dimensions: 1.8” x 3.1”
  • Series: LithiumTech
  • Battery style: post
  • Battery type: Li-Ion
  • Recharge time: 30 min.
  • Voltage: 12V

entry.title: G1 Battery Charger
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G1 Battery Charger
Price: 50.00

About G1 Battery Charger

12-Volt LithiumTech Charger with USB Port for Charging Devices

The 12V charger is used for charging the TheraGun's 12V battery. It has a quick charge time and allows the battery to reach a 75% charge in only 15 minutes, and a full charge in 30 minutes. A built-in USB port can charge small electronic devices, as well. The lighted on-board status indicators let you know where your battery is in the charge cycle and will turn green when the battery is fully charged. For a longer life, the battery should be removed when charging is complete.

Specifications
  • Item weight: 14.4 oz
  • Product dimensions: 7.9” x 3.5” x 5.7”

entry.title: G1 AmpBITs: The Tri-Pack
entry.s:type: G1 AmpBITs Large Ball, Small Ball & Cone
entry.summary:
Vendor: TheraGun
Type: G1 AmpBITs Large Ball, Small Ball & Cone
Price: 35.00

About AmpBITs: The Tri-Pack

PLEASE NOTE: This product cannot be used with the new G2PRO™. It is compatible with the TheraGun G1 only.

This is the elite bundle of three AmpBITs to give you more versatility in using your TheraGun G1.

Large Ball

  • High density foam ball with steel shaft
  • Item weight 2 oz
  • Product dimensions 2.5” in diameter x 3.1” tall
  • Expected use time: approximately 90 days

Small Ball

  • High density foam ball with steel shaft
  • Item weight 2 oz
  • Product dimensions 1.5” in diameter x 2.1” tall
  • Expected use time: approximately 90 days
Cone
  • High density foam cone with steel shaft
  • Item weight: 2 oz
  • Product dimensions: 1.5” in diameter x 2.4” tall
  • Expected use time: approximately 90 days
